subject: Re: [junit] HTML/XHTML Validation w/JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi! Write one to look for your requirement is XMLUnit (http://xmlunit.sourceforge.net/) Regards, Nagendra ... [Non-text portions of this message have been
messageBody:
Hi!

Write one to look for your requirement is XMLUnit
(http://xmlunit.sourceforge.net/)

Regards,
Nagendra


Craig Dickson wrote:

> Hi,
>
> Did a quick search of the archive and didn't seem to get an relevant
> hits on this one.
>
> We have been asked to make sure that all pages of our Web Application
> conform to a particular DTD (in this case it is XHTML 1.0), and while we
> will make our best efforts during development, we would like to add some
> tests to our JUnit suite to verify this.
>
> Anyone know of any projects that work with JUnit that have this built in
> so we don't have to start form scratch writing some kind of XML
> validation test?
>
> Thanks
>
>
>
>
